|||:Property|:Exists|:Barcode Rotation Enabled |:ticket delivery record |:Ticket Printed |:AFP settings
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) | FALSE |non-empty barcode secret   | FALSE |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default)  | FALSE |non-empty barcode secret   |TRUE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default)  | FALSE |non-empty barcode secret   | FALSE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) | FALSE | non-empty barcode secret  |FALSE   |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default)| FALSE | non-empty barcode secret  |FALSE   |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) | FALSE | TRUE | FALSE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) | TRUE |non-empty barcode secret   |FALSE   |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | TRUE | FALSE | FALSE | FALSE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) | FALSE |non-empty barcode secret   | TRUE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default) |FALSE  | TRUE | TRUE  |  Should not contain Barcode Secret Key 
|| protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled .. | FALSE(default)| TRUE  | TRUE | TRUE | Should not contain Barcode Secret Key

title: Add Ticket AFP to control which agencies/users have the new barcode secret returned in the V2 Print API
custom_preconds:
|||:protect.the.barcode.feature.enabled|:AFP  (Enable Access to Barcode Rotation) Dropdown|:V2 Print API Response
|| FALSE .. | Not visible on UI  |  
|| TRUE .. | Visible on UI  |  
||  .. | Disabled(User Level /Enabled for Upper Levels) |  Does not return Barcode Secret for User 
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Channel
||  .. |Disabled(Agency Level /Enabled for Channel)  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for User 
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Channel
||  .. | Disabled(Channel)|  Does not return Barcode Secret for User 
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Channel
||  .. | Enabled (User level) |  Returns Barcode Secret for User
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Channel
||  .. | Enabled (Agency level) |  Returns Barcode Secret for User
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Does not return Barcode Secret for Channel
||  .. | Enabled (Channel level) |  Returns Barcode Secret for User
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Agency
||  .. |  |  Returns Barcode Secret for Channel
custom_steps:
1. Print API with all above combinations
Expected Result:
Barcode Secret should only be returned as per conditions specified in the table above

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. Print API with all above combinations
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. Barcode Secret should only be returned as per conditions specified in the table above

TICKET_PRINT_SCAN record not written

title: Protect the Barcode: Add "TOTP" support, validation and logging to the V2 Scan/Validate API : POST /validate/ticket request : Valid TOTP
custom_preconds:
TOTP is present
barcode rotation is enabled and enforced, global feature flag is enabled
custom_steps:
1. Call V2 Print API after ticket sale 
Call V2 POST Validate Scan API with Valid TOTP 
{{base_url}}/api/v2/accessControl/validate/ticket/scan
Expected Result:
the following should be written to the TICKET_PRINT_SCAN record:
1.TOTP_VALUE received, truncated if necessary to avoid overflowing the column

2. TOTP_PROCESSING_TYPE_CODE: 

    F - Feature Disabled
    R - Rotation Disabled
    M - Monitor & Log Only
    E - Enforce

3. TOTP_RESULT_TYPE_CODE
    O - Offline (i.e., TOTP provided in Scan Actions API)
   S - Skipped (i.e.,  TOTP validation skipped because barcode/ticket itself was invalid)
   V - Valid (i.e., TOTP was provided and it was valid, within the grace period)
   I - Invalid (i.e., TOTP was provided and it was NOT valid, NOT within the grace period)
  N - Not Provided (and PV determined TOTP was not required)
  M - Missing (i.e., PV determined the TOTP was Required & it was Not Provided) 

4.TOTP_TIME_DIFF_IN_SECONDS
=0 (successfull validation )
now = resolve to positive 30, 60, etc. integers (increments of the time interval).


1.TICKET_PRINT_SCAN record written 

2.Set TOTP_TIME_DIFF_IN_SECONDS only If TOTP_RESULT_TYPE_CODEs of Valid or Invalid ( TOTP was actually validated)

3.Following info should be logged to server.log when the logger is set to Debug: 
Barcode
Scan Result Code
TOTP value
Event id/code
Event's "Barcode Rotation" setting
Global feature flag property value.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Call V2 Print API after ticket sale 
Call V2 POST Validate Scan API with Valid TOTP 
{{base_url}}/api/v2/accessControl/validate/ticket/scan
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. the following should be written to the TICKET_PRINT_SCAN record:
1.TOTP_VALUE received, truncated if necessary to avoid overflowing the column

2. TOTP_PROCESSING_TYPE_CODE: 

    F - Feature Disabled
    R - Rotation Disabled
    M - Monitor & Log Only
    E - Enforce

3. TOTP_RESULT_TYPE_CODE
    O - Offline (i.e., TOTP provided in Scan Actions API)
   S - Skipped (i.e.,  TOTP validation skipped because barcode/ticket itself was invalid)
   V - Valid (i.e., TOTP was provided and it was valid, within the grace period)
   I - Invalid (i.e., TOTP was provided and it was NOT valid, NOT within the grace period)
  N - Not Provided (and PV determined TOTP was not required)
  M - Missing (i.e., PV determined the TOTP was Required & it was Not Provided) 

4.TOTP_TIME_DIFF_IN_SECONDS
=0 (successfull validation )
now = resolve to positive 30, 60, etc. integers (increments of the time interval).


1.TICKET_PRINT_SCAN record written 

2.Set TOTP_TIME_DIFF_IN_SECONDS only If TOTP_RESULT_TYPE_CODEs of Valid or Invalid ( TOTP was actually validated)

3.Following info should be logged to server.log when the logger is set to Debug: 
Barcode
Scan Result Code
TOTP value
Event id/code
Event's "Barcode Rotation" setting
Global feature flag property value.

protect.the.barcode.totp.missing.allow.for.scan.media.types =
PB,GP,C3, that is, Apple Pass/Wallet, Google Pass/Wallet, Custom 3 (Ballpark Apple Pass/Wallet))
custom_steps:
1. GIVEN a validate scan without a TOTP value
AND with a valid scan media type
WHEN property "protect.the.barcode.totp.missing.allow.for.scan.media.types" includes the provided scan media type (this property defaults to PB,GP,C3, that is, Apple Pass/Wallet, Google Pass/Wallet, Custom 3 (Ballpark Apple Pass/Wallet)). 
THEN this validation request is allowed to continue processing without requiring a TOTP and without returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to NOT_PROVIDED_SCAN_MEDIA_TYPE_ROTATION_OPTIONAL
Expected Result:
Validation request is allowed to continue processing without requiring a TOTP and without returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to NOT_PROVIDED_SCAN_MEDIA_TYPE_ROTATION_OPTIONAL

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. GIVEN a validate scan without a TOTP value
AND with a valid scan media type
WHEN property "protect.the.barcode.totp.missing.allow.for.scan.media.types" includes the provided scan media type (this property defaults to PB,GP,C3, that is, Apple Pass/Wallet, Google Pass/Wallet, Custom 3 (Ballpark Apple Pass/Wallet)). 
THEN this validation request is allowed to continue processing without requiring a TOTP and without returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to NOT_PROVIDED_SCAN_MEDIA_TYPE_ROTATION_OPTIONAL
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Validation request is allowed to continue processing without requiring a TOTP and without returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to NOT_PROVIDED_SCAN_MEDIA_TYPE_ROTATION_OPTIONAL

title: Protect the Barcode: Add support for requiring a TOTP value in some situations for the V2 Scan/Validate API : MISS
custom_preconds: event barcode rotation set to Enforce
custom_steps:
1. GIVEN a validate scan without a TOTP value
AND none of the above conditions/exceptions being hit
WHEN the event rotate barcode is "Enable Enforce"
THEN this validation request should fail, returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to MISSING

Validation request should fail, returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to MISSING

2. if the TOTP required logic is being executed, we need to track how long this validation took (logging to be verified )

AND none of the above conditions/exceptions being hit

THEN this validation request should fail, returning the Missing Time Code error
AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to MISSING
custom_steps_separated.expected:

AND the TOTP Result Type Code should be set to MISSING

custom_steps:

Expected Result:
ignore the timestamp

custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. ignore the timestamp

title: Update the Scan Actions API to accept the totpTimestamp parameter: Reset Action
custom_steps:
1. GIVEN the TOTP is passed in the body of the request, AND in the "scanAction" is RESET AND the newly created property protect.the.barcode.scan.actions.eval.totp.results is true  
Expected Result:
The parameters totp and totpTimestamp should be ignored, and should NOT be persisted and the totp result type and totp time diff in seconds should not be calculated/persisted as well.

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. GIVEN the TOTP is passed in the body of the request, AND in the "scanAction" is RESET AND the newly created property protect.the.barcode.scan.actions.eval.totp.results is true
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. The parameters totp and totpTimestamp should be ignored, and should NOT be persisted and the totp result type and totp time diff in seconds should not be calculated/persisted as well.

title: Protect the Barcode: Enhance Ticket Services, Barcode Validation tab to add explanation text for the TOTP Result Type
custom_preconds:
protect.the.barcode.show.totp.on.validation :true
Perform Ticket Sale 
Perform Print API Post Call
custom_steps:
1. GIVEN the global PTB feature flag is true/set
AND the scan processing for the barcode results in a TOTP Result Type (of not null) being calculated (i.e., a higher level issue such as not found or returned or exchanged, etc. is not encountered)
THEN the new row/line of text should be displayed giving a more informative explanation of the TOTP result 
AND this new row/line should be styled with "red text" for INVALID, MISSING TOTP & INVALID_NO_SECRET result types, and "green text" for all other TOTP result types.
Expected Result:
new row/line of text should be displayed giving a more informative explanation of the TOTP result

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. GIVEN the global PTB feature flag is true/set
AND the scan processing for the barcode results in a TOTP Result Type (of not null) being calculated (i.e., a higher level issue such as not found or returned or exchanged, etc. is not encountered)
THEN the new row/line of text should be displayed giving a more informative explanation of the TOTP result 
AND this new row/line should be styled with "red text" for INVALID, MISSING TOTP & INVALID_NO_SECRET result types, and "green text" for all other TOTP result types.
custom_steps_separated.expected: 1. new row/line of text should be displayed giving a more informative explanation of the TOTP result

title: Add new fields supporting the Rotating Barcode to the MLB Real Time Scan Feed
custom_preconds:
Perform Ticket sale 
Print Action API 
Scan Actions API - POST
custom_steps:
1. GIVEN a ticket with a rotating barcode that has been scanned for entry
WHEN details have been inserted into the ticket_print_scan table
THEN data will be added to the MLB real time scan feed
AND I will be able to see the actual TOTP value that was received, the processing type code, the TOTP result code, the TOTP time difference in seconds, and the TOTP_TIMESTAMP.

The specified fields should be visible of the data bus messaging table on the DB
